abstract: Lions Gate Entertainment is urging its shareholders to vote on a rights plan aimed at rebuffing a hostile bid from Carl C. Icahn.
snippet: Lions Gate Entertainment is urging its shareholders to vote on a rights plan aimed at rebuffing a hostile bid from Carl C. Icahn.
lead_paragraph: Shareholders are being invited to get involved in the battle between Lions Gate Entertainment and the billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn, who already controls nearly 19 percent of the company’s stock, The Associated Press reports.

headline.main: Lions Gate Takes Fight With Icahn to Shareholders
